recipesJson.name: Fuji 1.0
recipesJson.author: Dank1
recipesJson.description: This Apple juice vape,is the Ferrari of the apple universe

reviews.text: It's ok, but I wouldn't say there's anything remarkable about it.
This is so good, has a candy carmel apple kind of thing going on.
Very nice apple mix for sure
Ive never driven a  Ferrari so I'm not sure if it is that good.   Ok fine it's pretty damn good.   Fuji and cactus know how to behave in a recipe.  Nice job.
Delicious Recipe with the perfect balance of the Cactus and Fuji! Mix this, Do IT!!
